parameter.value: I'm as handsome as I'm skilled with the smithing tools.
I can trade different steels with you, |PLAYERNAME|, but also various weapons.
Yes, you got it right. You give me information of what you want, I make it, you pay. Simple trade. Although, I must confess my knowledges are limited, so you'll have to stick to a few things, only.
I'm afraid I can't handle advanced weaponry like swords.
Axes, well, not really, they're a bit too complicated for me.
Clubs are cool but extremely hard to forge. Maybe something... hm, bolts?

Well, bolts are made out of wood, right? Not something for me, actually. But you might've heard about the infernal bolts. And the quite mysterious material, they are made of, too? Well, maybe we could make a trade if you provide me with the right items.
One single soul orb consists of magic enough to create six infernal bolts. Let's cut it even, I take three, and you three... just bring me a soul orb.
I don't know if I should call it weapons, but I know some things about bolts.
I have draconian steel, hell steel, huge chunk of crude iron and royal steel.
Infernal bolts are created out of the mystic materia known as soul orb.
Hello there, |PLAYERNAME|, what a pleasant surprise.
